content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  March 23 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the ratings for Keysight  Technologies Incorporated (Keysight)  including the company's Long-Term Issuer  Default Rating (IDR) at 'BBB'. Fitch has also assigned a 'BBB' rating to the  $700 million of senior notes Fitch expects Keysight to issue to fund the Ixia  acquisition. The Rating Outlook is Negative. content: Keysight Technologies Inc   a provider of software and equipment to the electronics industry  said on Monday it would buy U.S. data technology company Ixia  for about $1.6 billion in cash in a bid to increase its software and security portfolio.

title: Keysight Technologies to buy Ixia for $1.6 billion
